name: Excalibur
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en:
Excalibur is a Fantom-based highly flexible and ecosystem-oriented AMM providing fee mining, swap referrals and customizable fees.
It aims for long-term efficiency and sustainability through advanced shareholding mechanisms, time vault staking & project-owned liquidity.
